title: JetBlue has increased flights to meet the needs of Patriots fans this weekend
author: Kristi Palma
bullets: Flights “Pats fans travel with passion, and we’re proud to help bring that energy to this pivotal game.
” The side of a JetBlue plane at Logan Airport.

Stephan Savoia By Kristi Palma January 21, 2026 | 11:18 AM 1 minute to read Due to “overwhelming demand” from New England Patriots fans, JetBlue has increased service out of Boston for the AFC Championship game in Denver on Sunday.

title: Robert Kraft explained how AFC East rival convinced him to ‘never’ build a dome stadium for the Patriots
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots The Bills were at the height of their powers in the 1990's, and Kraft was impressed with their home-field advantage.
Robert Kraft Pamela Smith/Getty Images Sometimes, like it was during the Patriots’ divisional-round win against the Texans, the cold weather in Foxborough can be an advantage.
Patriots owner Robert Kraft realized this in 1994 around the time that he bought the franchise.
